name: Crapy House 3
description:
You just move into a new place, and it doesn't results to be quite good as you expected. 

Fight and make an effort to turn it into your new home!

-----------------------------------------------

A game originally developed for Global Game Jam 2019 by:

KiKe Corts - Graphics (https://twitter.com/kikekun)

At.Colombini - Code (https://twitter.com/atcolombini)

Vicent R.L- Design (https://twitter.com/gotomakethehand)

Alex Benet - Sound & Music (https://twitter.com/alexbenetmusic)
